text: Charlie Ware (9 July 1903 – 19 March 1984) was an Irish sportsperson. He played hurling with his local club Erin's Own and was a member of the Waterford senior inter-county team from the 1920s until the 1940s. ==References== Category:Erin's Own hurlers (Waterford) Category:Waterford inter-county hurlers Category:Munster inter-provincial hurlers Category:Sportspeople from Cork (city) Category:1903 births Category:1984 deaths
title: Charlie Ware Snr
